Therefore, my friend, who is, as I am, with my little fortune sacrificed, and Your Grace Your Grace.

Your slaves have not been possible to know news about them, and regarding your yacht in the last letters I received from Vicente, nothing has been arranged yet.

I continue to assure you that whenever I am employed in your service, it will satisfy whoever it is.

I greatly urge the promptness of this my business, as it will soon be necessary for me to present the order or pay the duties in cash.
